Start ASH Abstract Achievement Awards - Cody Ramirez and Felicia Gomez

ASH Abstract Achievement Awards - Cody Ramirez and Felicia Gomez

Cody Ramirez and Felicia Gomez were honored with abstract achievement awards for the 2017 American Society of Hematology Annual Meeting.

Cody Ramirez received an American Society of Hematology (ASH) Abstract Achievement Award for his abstract entitled “Integration of Whole Exome and RNA Sequencing Identifies Neoepitope Vaccine Candidates in >90 Percent of Follicular Lymphoma Patients”. He will be presenting this work in an oral presentation on Saturday, December 9th at the 59th ASH Annual Meeting and Exposition in Atlanta, GA. Also honored with this award, Felicia Gomez PhD, will be presenting her abstract “Ultra Deep Whole Exome Sequencing of Classical Hodgkin Lymphoma (cHL) Reveals Novel Recurrent Somatic Mutations” in a poster presentation on Sunday, December 10th. See the full list of recipients and more about the award here.

2017-11-01
